package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.lsfileae;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractHostToJavaEsbTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileae.Dfhcommarea;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileae.bind.DfhcommareaTransformers;

/**
 * LegStar/Mule Operation Host Byte Array to Dfhcommarea Transformer.
 * 
 * <code>HostByteArrayToDfhcommarea</code> takes a byte array in host format
 * (EBCDIC) coming from a source Mainframe as input and turns it into
 * a Dfhcommarea object.
 * 
 * This class was generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class HostByteArrayToDfhcommarea extends AbstractHostToJavaEsbTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a byte array and result will be
     * a Dfhcommarea object.
     */
    public HostByteArrayToDfhcommarea() {
        super(new DfhcommareaTransformers());
        setReturnClass(Dfhcommarea.class);
    }


}
